com.magnet.spi

Interface ProviderEvent


  • public interface ProviderEvent
    The Event that corresponds to the invocation result, and/or any exceptions that were thrown along the way.

    Decorator and Listener Exceptions do not percolate up the chain, instead they are captured here.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<ServiceProvider,Throwable> getExceptions()
      An ordered map from the set of providers that were found to throw throwables from those providers.
      Object getResult()
      Returns the result.
      boolean wasSuccessful()
      Returns true if the complete call sequence was successful.

    • Method Detail

      • wasSuccessful

        boolean wasSuccessful()
        Returns true if the complete call sequence was successful.

      • getResult

        Object getResult()
                 throws Throwable
        Returns the result. If there was any error encountered, then the first fatal exception that was found will be re-thrown.
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • getExceptions

        Map<ServiceProvider,Throwable> getExceptions()
        An ordered map from the set of providers that were found to throw throwables from those providers.

        If more than one throwable originates from an ServiceProvider instance, then only the last one is captured and returned.
